thread.section_title: South America travel information, holiday ideas, advice and reviews
thread.title: The world's best city beaches

author: Telegraph Staff
title: The world's best city beaches
text:
Paris 
For one month every summer, visitors and locals in Paris can enjoy artificial beaches installed along the banks of the Seine and the Bassin de la Villette at the Paris-Plages beach event, which begins around the third week of July . Visitors can sunbathe on a beach complete with sand, deck chairs and palm trees on the Georges Pompidou highway, which is pedestrianised for the event. The Bassin de la Villette, the capital's largest artificial lake, offers watersport activities including paddle boating, sailing and canoeing. Picture: Paris-Plages event in 2013 (Getty Images)
